type.description: Chef cookbook file applied on the host, in tar.gz format.

generate-deployable.description: Chef cookbook file applied on the host, in tar.gz format.

property.name: recipe
property.description: Comma-seperated list of recipes to be applied from cookbook. For example, test-cookbook::recipe-one, test-cookbook::recipe-two, where 'recipe-one' and 'recipe-two' are the names of recipes in test-cookbook.tar.gz.

property.name: runOrder
property.description: Order at which the Chef recipe should be run.

property.name: tarCommand
property.description: Command used to open a .tar.gz file. If not specified the tar.exe from chefPath will be used. Microsoft Windows only.
